column1: Smoque BBQ////Count on standing in line to place your order
column2: and then standing around to pick up your order when your number is called. And no grabbing a table in the interim. They have folks who will try to be polite telling you they'll show you where to sit
column3: but only when your food is ready.  Inside
column4: maybe seating for  50 at tables for two that can be pushed together
column5: and outside maybe enough for 25 more.
